title: Lux skins Bugged ..
body:
Lux has a bug in her skins .. i can't swap into " star Gordian " .. or into Classic skin ..  when ever i swap and it load what i did .. it steel on the " Steel Legion " skin .. 


please solve it .. i want to play as " Star Gordian " 

thank you ..

best regards

replies.body: I want to play as Star Gordian too he seems awesome

Hey Naxxrumas, 

Which queue are you generally in when you're having this issue? Just to be clear, you do own Start Guardian Lux, correct?
